Sentencas: The relative performances of six air source heat pumps (ASHP) and a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power (SOFC-mCHP) unit are compared using a modelling approach.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: The emphasis is in indicating the effect of a wide range of operating conditions and methodologies, rather than detailed analysis of the performance of the units under limited specific circumstances.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: The effect of control methodologies is the primary focus but other variables such as the climate and the specification of the buildings to which heat is supplied are considered.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration
Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: Firstly, a reduction in heating demands due to warmer will reduce the impacts of both heating systems.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: In the case of ASHPs, lower heat demands improve performance.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: In the case of SOFC-mCHP systems they reduce the need for auxiliary heating.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: A wide range of performances may be achieved by ASHPs, even supplying heat to the same building; the way in which ASHP units are controlled has the potential to reduce their impacts by more than a third.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: The greatest savings achieved by the SOFC-mCHP unit occur when it is run continuously at full output, despite the consequent dumping of excess heat.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: Although the auxiliary heaters used with them inevitably reduce their overall benefit, they are still capable of significant savings.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration

Sentencas: It is currently possible for the units to offset more emissions than they create.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration
Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration
Effect of operating conditions on performance of domestic heating systems with heat pumps and fuel cell micro-cogeneration
